wikipedia_page.main: Angus Ross (18 April 1953 – 17 January 2016) was a Scottish professional darts player who competed in the 1970s and 1980s.

response: In 1981 captaining Jocky Wilson and Angus Ross for Scotland, Smith won the 1981 BDO Nations Cup beating Bristow, Lowe and Lazarenko of England in the final.Cliff Lazarenko vs Angus Ross 1981 Nations Cup Final Each Scot won their leg against Lazarenko. Smith also defeated Lowe and Wilson beat Bristow for a 5–4 win.England vs. Scotland – 1981 BDO Nations Cup FINAL  Dave Lanning commentating described "The indeterminable Rab Smith" as, "A fine, fluid player on his day" and "a dapper little character, there's a lot said about the big gross darts players but Rab presents a very neat, clean cut image."Cliff Lazarenko vs Rab Smith 1981 Nations Cup Final  Lowe beat Smith 2–1 in the News of the World Individual Darts Championship semi final at the Wembley Arena. Smith later said, "I was on double four with John back on 140 or 160. He threw and left double top. In my next throw I clipped the top wire of double four three times. Then John hit double top."
*Angus Ross, 59, Scottish darts player, pancreatic cancer.
